title: The Gift An Islamic Tale
description:
When Imran learned about his mother's illness, he wants to offer her he ultimate gift.....
The gift involves a pious muslim woman who was presented to him as a potential future bride.
Soon their life is torn apart. He is compelled to forget his past.
Syakirah must decide about th most crucial decision in her life.
Both struggle between charity, compassion, duty and faith.
Will they reach out to make th gift a reality, and maybe, find at last, happiness?

Language: English
Format: pdf
Pages: 117
Author: Sister Nur Taqwa
